/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the soft glow of the setting sun. Trees line the street, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape.

Vehicles of various types and colors are scattered along the street, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. Among them, a yellow taxi stands out, its vibrant color contrasting with the more muted tones of the surrounding vehicles.

The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun setting in the distance, casting long shadows and bathing everything in a warm, inviting light. The image captures the essence of a typical day in Beijing, with its blend of urban life and natural beauty.
